item.title: Cookie Hijacking
Session Fixation
item.description: Exploitation link1. Attacker Logins Website to Get the Session linkAn attacker need to login to a legitimate website then get the session value. Cookie: sessid=abcdef 2. Attacker Sends the Session Value to Victim linkThere are various way to send the attacker’s session value. For example, Send email. Predict a session value. Eavesdrop a session using packet sniffer such as Wireshark. XSS <script>document.cookie = ATTACKERS_SESSION_ID</script> 3. Victim Logins with Attacker’s Session linkIf the victim logins and attacker’s session is set to the Cookie, the attacker can control the victim’s account in the website.
